entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning in the evening then changing to freezing rain near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
